DOC.brief_summary: Previous study show chronic pain hysterectomy common . The aim study investigate incidence chronic pain vaginal laparoscopic hysterectomy benign reason . The aim prospective study also study role anesthetic , surgery possible predictor pain 6 month hysterectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Vaginal Laparoscopic Hysterectomy , Persistent Postsurgical Pain
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo vaginal laparoscopic hysterectomy benign condition Age 1869 year Gender : female ASA status 13 Body Mass Index 35 Diabetes mellitus Liver disease Preoperative use opioids
